dcterms:creator: S. Makridakis
E. Spiliotis
V. Assimakopoulos
dcterms:description: The M5 Competition dataset contains 42,840 hierarchical sales data from Walmart, covering stores in California, Texas, and Wisconsin, with sales data per item level, department, and product categories from February 2011 to April 2016.
dcterms:title: M5 Competition Dataset
